BLA¶

covidmap.preprocess.format_granu.format_granularity(df_covid, granularity)¶

Format the dataframe by changing ‘maille_code’ with the format ‘DEP-XX’ in the format ‘XX’. For instance, “DEP-33” becomes “33”. :param df_covid: dataframe with covid data
